title: Micron reports adjusted earnings of 90 cents a share on sales of $4.65 billion, beating expectations
text:

Micron reports adjusted earnings of 90 cents a share on sales of $4.65 billion, beating expectations 3 min ago 4:06   MarketWatch 10:16 a.m. Today 10:16 a.m. March 23, 2017 - Therese Poletti 2:55 p.m. March 3,   2:50 p.m. Feb. 18, 2017 - Nigam Arora 8:09 a.m. Feb. 10,   2:22 p.m. Feb. 9, 2017 - Wallace Witkowski 5:08 p.m. Feb. 2, 2017 - Wallace Witkowski 2:00 p.m. Feb. 2, 2017 - Jennifer Booton

Micron Tech CEO Mark Durcan to retire 1:54 p.m. Feb. 2,  03 a.m. Feb. 1, 2017 - Caitlin Huston 9:51 a.m. Jan. 16,   2:51 p.m. Jan. 3, 2017 - Michael Ashbaugh 2:27 p.m. Jan. 3, 2017 - Michael Ashbaugh 5:18 p.m. Dec. 22, 2016 - Anora Mahmudova 3:45 p.m. Dec. 22, 2016 - Barbara Kollmeyer
